dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge J. Belongie
dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO is a large-scale dataset designed for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, containing images with complex scenes and multiple objects.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
Luc J. Van Gool
Christopher K. I. Williams
John M. Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC dataset is a benchmark in visual object category recognition and detection, providing a standard dataset for evaluating object detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC
